tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    agenda TEXT,
    organizer VARCHAR(50),
    attendees JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE meetings_schedule (
    meeting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_agendas (
    agenda_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT REFERENCES meetings_schedule(meeting_id),
    agenda_item TEXT NOT NULL,
    presenter VARCHAR(100),
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
    meeting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    meeting_duration INTERVAL,
    meeting_agenda TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Participants (
    participant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES Meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Invitation (
    invitation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    is_accepted BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES Meetings(meeting_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_title VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    agenda TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
    attendee_email VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meetings (meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
meeting_date DATE,
meeting_time TIME,
agenda TEXT,
attendees VARCHAR[])

CREATE TABLE attendees (attendee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
attendee_name VARCHAR,
attendee_email VARCHAR,
attendee_role VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE calendar (calendar_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
meeting_id UUID,
meeting_date DATE,
meeting_time TIME)

CREATE TABLE rooms (room_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
room_name VARCHAR,
capacity INT)

CREATE TABLE notifications (notification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
meeting_id UUID,
notification_type VARCHAR,
notification_message TEXT)
